content: GEO sales over the five-year period ending 2028, are expected to average 140,000 GEOs per year, a significant increase over the current levels, primarily due to Northparkes, where, in the short-term, increased gold production from E31 North open pit, and in the medium term, the ramp-up of E22 deposits were â both of which host materially higher gold grades than the current run-of-mine feed forecast for 2023. Your line is open. Your line is open. But we are seeing multiple transactions for the first time in a couple of years really that are meaningfully cash-generating and well-advanced precious metals focused, some acquisition financing-related opportunities, some sort of value realization situations, Iâd say, generally in favorable jurisdictions. Your line is open. Your line is open. And as I said, the actual underlying operating performance that theyâve done on silver because you may have seen next to put our guidance for the next three years, they had good results, but theyâre three years, I think, on some of the base metal assumptions have come down. Thanks very much, Shaun. Your line is open. Your line is open. Thanks very much, Shaun.
